channel.title: TimetoGo on Dick Johnson
channel.description: Recent content in TimetoGo on Dick Johnson

item.title: TimetoGo2 now available for macOS
item.description: TimetoGo2 is now available for macOS Simple Time to Go macOS App. Calculates weeks and days from today to selected dates in the future or past. Includes a lead time date for a given numbers of week from today. Simple. What’s new First macOS release All the best, Dick.

item.title: TimeToGo Version 1.1 Released for Android
item.description: Version 1.1 of TimeToGo, TtG, was approved and released for Android today. Simple Time to Go App. Calculates the weeks and days from today to a date in the future. Shows the end date for a given numbers of weeks from today. Select an inspiring picture to remind yourself of your goal. Simple. Google Play and the Google Play logo are trademarks of Google LLC.

item.title: TimetoGo2 1.1.6 Released for iOS
item.description: Version 1.1.6 of TimetoGo2, was approved and released for iOS today Simple Time to Go iOS App. Calculates weeks and days from today to selected dates in the future or past. Includes a lead time date for a given numbers of week from today. Simple. What’s new Fixed a few bugs All the best, Dick.

item.title: TimeToGo Version 1.1 Released
item.description: So today version 1.1 of TimeToGo, TtG, was approved and released. I hope you enjoy the added capability of having the dates in the correct format for your device locale. Fastlane continues to make the process of test and development, as well as app screenshot capture and formatting a breeze. If you haven’t used it, I can thoroughly recommend it. All the best, Dick.

item.title: TimeToGo Updates for Locale
item.description: I know TimeToGo has only just been released, but I’ve been working on the next version, which is now in review. This version display’s the dates and date picker in the correct format for the device’s locale setting. As I’d been working on all the other things needed for the App Store release, I wanted to get the first working version reviewed and released, and then to develop the functionality further, to make the app more useful for more people.

item.title: TimeToGo Released
item.description:
Well today my first app, TimeToGo, TtG, was released.
Originally written for my wife, I hope you find it useful to. Please give me feedback. All the best, Dick.

item.title: Welcome to Firewerkz
item.description:
Just starting my app development journey.
All the best, Dick.
